page.title: 12Changes in Plympton St.Mary.
page.content: The biggest worry to local residents is the{Industrial Estate}being built near Chaddlewood. Apart from the actual buildings,which are to be for light industry,there are also{two pipe lines}which have been laid across the area. One is a{gas pipe}which helps to deliver gas more easily to Cornwall, and the other is a{water main}which connects to the resevoir at Lutton. Both of these have been laid close enough to the new Industrial Estate to be of benefit.At least the{excavations {have been landscaped again}and the Devon Hedges been replaced. The other worry is the proposed {housing development}around Chaddlewood farm.Already dwellings are creeping into the area eating up valuable land.
